title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: linen embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, eyelet, looping, and buttonhole stitches, with withdrawn and cut element work, on plain weave foundation
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Brought from Perugia by Mrs. Wiltbank, 1922.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Vertical rectangle with twelve bands of white on white embroidery, including cut work with needle-made fillings.  The bands are variations of floral vines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler.
Medium: linen embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, eyelet, looping, and buttonhole stitches, with withdrawn and cut element work, on plain weave foundation. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1974-100-28.
